Denser_Summary: Uber users have reported various issues with the app, including poor customer service, unfair cancellation fees, and unprofessional driver behavior. Some users have experienced difficulties with the app's navigation system, while others have been charged incorrectly for their rides. Additionally, some drivers have been reported to be uncooperative or unprofessional, leading to a negative experience for users. Despite these issues, many users have also reported positive experiences with Uber, citing the convenience and affordability of the service.
